Front 02. 1X Zero 03. Casualties 04. Runaway 05. Within 06. Weapon Of Rage 07. Insolece (Terrorists) 08. Lies 09. Words Of Hate 10. Betrayed 11. Inh

entry.def: If you say that someone is being insolent, you mean they are being rude to someone they ought to be respectful to.

example.ex: The officer stamped his boot. 'Don't be insolent with me, mademoiselle.'
example.tran: 军官跺跺靴子：“小姐,别对我无礼。”

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of being rude and impertinent; inclined to take liberties

sentences.en: His insolence is more than I can stand.
I was out of patience with his insolence.
sentences.cn: 我对他的傲慢无礼无法容忍。

sentences.en: I’ll make you suffer for this insolence.
sentences.cn: 我会因你无礼而使你受苦的。

sentences.en: Teachers don’t like insolence from pupils.
Peter swept in,with his dignity and insolence.
sentences.cn: 彼得神气十足,目空一切地走了进来。
